Package DBAccess

Class DBAppointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBAccess.DBAppointment
  • public class DBAppointment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods that will get appointment information from database.

      • newOverlap

        public static Appointment newOverlap​(java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                     int customerID)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Search appointments for specified time. If specified time is between any current appointment times then it will fill list with the list of overlapping appointments.
        Parameters:
        start -
        end -
        customerID -
        Returns:
        Overlapping appointment list
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • modOverlap

        public static Appointment modOverlap​(java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                     int customerID)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Search appointments for specified time. If specified time is between any current appointment times then it will fill list with the list of overlapping appointments. Used to modify appointment. Difference in this one is it will skip current appointment and not count it as an overlapping appointment. This way if any appointment info is changed other than time overlap error will not appear.
        Parameters:
        start -
        end -
        customerID -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • associatedAppointment

        public static boolean associatedAppointment​(int id)
        Make a list that associates an appointment to specified customer id. Used to check if a specified customer ID has any appointments in appointment list.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        Boolean of Customer ID appearance in Appointment list

      • getContacts

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getContacts​(int Contact)
        Search appointment list for specified contact ID. If specified contact ID found return list of appointments with specified contact ID.
        Parameters:
        Contact -
        Returns:
        Contact list
